name: Magix
description:
This is a game I created for a school project in 2018.  It was created from scratch in two months, and a majority of that time was spent on the art (because I'm slow with that).  It's essentially just a proof of concept right now, but I have plans on greatly expanding it into a full game eventually.  See Devlog for any updates.

In it, you play as a stage magician and simply have to get past each door to get to the next level.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

W or up arrow to jump

Space or mouse click to shoot magic toward the mouse cursor

R to reset the level

Escape to go back to the main menu

Credits:

All coding, design, and art by me

All sound effects from freesound.org

All music from bensound.com (The in-game credits say bensounds.com, but that's a typo)

Made in Unreal Engine 4.17
